Description: * Outer ziplines hero speed increased by 20% relative to inner lanes (same as troopers on outer lanes zipline being faster)
* Urn now drops when teleporting with {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage's {{PageRef|Traveler}} Traveler
* Fixed {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith Cards, {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv Rage and lifesteal from increasing by shooting the shop
